thread.section_title: O'Briens Wine Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of O'Briens Wine | www.obrienswine.ie
thread.title: Karen Mac Hale
thread.title_full: O'Briens Wine reviewed by Karen Mac Hale

author: Karen Mac Hale
title: Karen Mac Hale
text: I use this O'Brien's to send wine to people as gifts. As I live abroad this is really handy for me. The website is easy to use and the delivery is efficient - always within a couple of days. I have used their service many times and never had a problem. I highly recommend them.
